# IPSIM-*Cirsium* <img src='inst/app/www/logo-ipsimcirsium.png' height="300px" align="right" style="padding: 1px;"/>

**IPSIM-*Cirsium*** is a tool developped by INRA for professionals in agriculture to predict and manage the damage caused by thistle on crops in France.

## Local usage

You can install **{ipsimcirsium}** R package from [gitlab](https://gitlab.com/doana-r/ipsimcirsium) with:

```{r install, eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_gitlab("doana-r/ipsimcirsium")
```


Run this command to launch the app locally:

```{r run, eval=FALSE}
library(ipsimcirsium)
run_app("en")

# or the french version:
run_app("fr")
```
